trainingClasses.name: Chest Training
trainingClasses.details: Focus on upper, middle, and lower chest development.
focusAreas: Incline Bench Press – Targets upper chest
Flat Bench Press – Builds overall mass
Decline Bench Press – Emphasizes lower chest

trainingClasses.name: Back Training
trainingClasses.details: Target lats, traps, and spinal erectors for a strong and wide back.
focusAreas: Lat Pulldown – Width and lat activation
Face Pulls – Rear delts and traps
